li.a: Lloyd G. Johnson Junior High School
Request for Proposal Priority 2 Pierce Joint USD 2018-19 with Update Deadlines
Addendum: E-Rate Vendor Questions and Answers RFP# 2017-001

span.style: font-size: medium; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

div.p: Pierce Joint Unified will be starting meal service on Monday, March 23. Any child from age 0-18 is eligible to receive free meals. Lunch and breakfast for the following day will be distributed for students to take home and eat. The food pick up will be at Arbuckle Elementary School from 11 a.m. to noon on weekdays. Students must be present to receive a meal. Students on rural bus routes will be able to do meal pick up at their regular bus stop around lunch time. Please see meal delivery schedules below.

span.style: font-size: medium; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

div.span: Pierce Joint Unified comenzar el servicio de comidas el lunes 23 de marzo. Cualquier nio de 0 a 18 aos es elegible para recibir comidas gratis. El almuerzo y el desayuno del da siguiente se distribuirn para que los estudiantes se lleven a casa y coman. La recoleccin de alimentos ser en la Escuela Primaria Arbuckle de 11 am al medioda de lunes a viernes. Los estudiantes deben estar presentes para recibir una comida. Los estudiantes en las rutas de autobuses rurales podrn recoger comida en su parada de autobs regular alrededor de la hora del almuerzo. Consulte los horarios de entrega de comidas a continuacin.
